parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the column whose title to set

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to set the hidden column title, false to not

title: ITableAnnotation.SetColumnTitle2
description: Sets the title of the specified column.
signature:
System.Boolean SetColumnTitle2( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.String
Title
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeHidden
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the column whose title to set

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to set the hidden column title, false to not

returns: True if title is set, false if not
remarks:
The index for both rows and columns is 0-based.
False is returned if the table does not have a header enabled. The title cannot be set to empty text.
